Name: SENSOR PLATFORM
Explanation: THE PLATFORM ON WHICH A SENSOR IS USED TO GATHER ELECTRONIC AND/OR ACOUSTIC DATA.

Name: PLATFORM TYPE, HOLDING CONTACT
Explanation: THE PLATFORM ON WHICH A SENSOR IS IN CONTACT WITH A TARGET.

Name: SCENE OF ACTION COMMANDER
Explanation: THE PLATFORM ON WHICH THE SCENE OF ACTION COMMANDER IS EMBARKED.

Name: PLATFORM TYPE, PARTICIPATING
Explanation: THE PLATFORM TYPE WHICH IS PARTICIPATING IN THE COORDINATED OPERATIONS.

Name: PLATFORM TYPE, OTHER
Explanation: THE OTHER PLATFORM TYPE PARTICIPATING IN THE COORDINATED OPERATIONS.

Name: ASW PLATFORM TYPE
Explanation: THE TYPE OF VESSEL OR AIRCRAFT WHICH SENSORS/WEAPONS ARE FITTED TO CARRY OUT ASW OPERATIONS.
